title: Remove depenency on MemberRef Parent of a custom attribute constructor being a TypeReference
body:
Fixes #6734 

Also fixes #6730

This fixes #6734 in my scenario.

commit.message: Remove depenency on MemberRef Parent of a custom attribute constructor being a TypeReference

nodes.body: To test, can you try overwriting your runtime SDK's copy of MSBuild  with a just-built one following the docs here? https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/Deploy-MSBuild.md
@rainersigwald Thank you for the advice, with this fix, the issue is fixed.
